text:
Good pizza but horrible service.
Stopped ordering from them just because of their service. Otherwise pizza is good if you can get it delivered while it's still hot
Pizza2Go is the way to go .. Good crust .. not mussy thick like dominoz ... red sauce has flavor of it own , unlike sour pizza hut taste..

Standard crust is great, and the thick crust really revealed a pastry lightness and crispiness. Need I say more? I'll seal the deal by adding the toppings are fresh, well dispersed and the price is remarkable. The garlic dip included is bomb.
